info.name: DocuSeal API
info.description:
#### **Start using the DocuSeal Postman Collection** 1. Visit the [DocuSeal Console](https://console.docuseal.com/api) and copy the X-Auth-Token. 2. Add the copied value as an API key in the header Check out [DocuSeal's API Documentation

](https://www.docuseal.com/docs/api)**API SDK** - TypeScript / JavaScript - [https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal-js](https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal-js) - Python - [https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal-python](https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal-python) - Ruby - [https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal-ruby](https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal-ruby) - PHP - [https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal-php](https://github.com/docusealco/docuseal-php)

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the document template.

request.description: The API endpoint allows to clone existing template into a new template.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the document template.

request.description: The API endpoint provides the functionality to retrieve information about a document template.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the document template.

request.description: The API endpoint allows to archive a document template.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Move a template to a different folder

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the document template.

request.description: The API endpoint provides the functionality to move a document template to a different folder.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: The API endpoint provides the functionality to seamlessly generate a PDF document template by utilizing the provided HTML content while incorporating pre-defined fields.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Create a template from Word DOCX

request.description: The API endpoint provides the functionality to create a fillable document template for existing Microsoft Word document. Use {{Field Name;role=Signer1;type=date}} text tags to define fillable fields in the document. See https://www.docuseal.co/examples/fieldtags.docx for more text tag formats. Or specify the exact pixel coordinates of the document fields using `fields` param.'

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Create a template from existing PDF

request.description: The API endpoint provides the functionality to create a fillable document template for existing PDF file. Use {{Field Name;role=Signer1;type=date}} text tags to define fillable fields in the document. See https://www.docuseal.co/examples/fieldtags.pdf for more text tag formats. Or specify the exact pixel coordinates of the document fields using `fields` param.'

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

query.description: The unique applications-specific identifier provided for the template via API or Embedded template form builder. Allows to receive only templates with your specified application key.
Filter templates by folder name.
Get only archived templates instead of active ones.
The number of templates to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 100.
The unique identifier of the template to end the list with. Allows to receive only templates with id less than the specified value.
The unique identifier of the template to start the list from. Allows to receive only templates with id greater than the specified value.

request.description: The API endpoint provides the ability to retrieve a list of available document templates.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

query.description: The unique applications-specific identifier provided for the template via API or Embedded template form builder. Allows to receive only templates with your specified application key.
Filter templates by folder name.
Get only archived templates instead of active ones.
The number of templates to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 100.
The unique identifier of the template to end the list with. Allows to receive only templates with id less than the specified value.
The unique identifier of the template to start the list from. Allows to receive only templates with id greater than the specified value.

request.description: This API endpoint allows you to create submissions for a document template and send them to the specified email addresses.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

query.description: The unique identifier of the document template. Allows to receive only submissions for a specific template.
Filter submissions by the given `application_key` value.
Filter submissions by template folder name.
The number of submissions to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 100.
The unique identifier of the submission to end the list with. Allows to receive only submissions with id less than the specified value.
The unique identifier of the submission to start the list from. Allows to receive only submissions with id greater than the specified value.

request.description: The API endpoint provides the ability to retrieve a list of available submissions.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

Filter submissions by the given `application_key` value.
Filter submissions by template folder name.
The number of submissions to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 100.
The unique identifier of the submission to end the list with. Allows to receive only submissions with id less than the specified value.
The unique identifier of the submission to start the list from. Allows to receive only submissions with id greater than the specified value.

request.description: This API endpoint allows you to create submissions for a document template and send them to the specified submitters

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the submitter.

request.description: The API endpoint provides the functionality to retrieve information about a submitter.

variable.description: (Required) The unique identifier of the submitter.

request.description: The API endpoint provides allows to update submitter details, field values and re-send emails.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

query.description: The unique identifier of the submission. Allows to receive only submitters for a submission.
The unique applications-specific identifier provided for a submitter when initializing a signature request. Allows to receive only submitters with a specified application key.
The number of submitters to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 100.
The unique identifier of the submitter to end the list with. Allows to receive only submitters with id less than the specified value.
The unique identifier of the submitter to start the list from. Allows to receive only submitters with id greater than the specified value.

request.description: The API endpoint provides the ability to retrieve a list of submitters.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

query.description: The unique identifier of the submission. Allows to receive only submitters for a submission.
The unique applications-specific identifier provided for a submitter when initializing a signature request. Allows to receive only submitters with a specified application key.
The number of submitters to return. Default value is 10. Maximum value is 100.
The unique identifier of the submitter to end the list with. Allows to receive only submitters with id less than the specified value.
The unique identifier of the submitter to start the list from. Allows to receive only submitters with id greater than the specified value.
